name: UniPi
body:
#### uniPi:  _use UNIFI SDK for UNIX and sun/oracle jre/jdk on ARM embedded platforms to run unifi's controller software, and other related functions._


***
`**UniPi**`
***

* [PREREQUISITES](https://github.com/dataweapons/uniPi/blob/master/Prerequisites) -- for enterprise deployment.
* install.sh -- build and run Unifi controller on raspi. 
* postInstall.sh -- post install modifications 
* README.md -- this document


***
`**UNIFI KNOWLEDGE BASE**`
***

* [UniFi-Layer-3-methods-for-UAP-adoption-and-management ](https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/articles/204909754-UniFi-Layer-3-methods-for-UAP-adoption-and-management )
* [UNIFI - VLAN Switch Configuration](https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/articles/205146150-UniFi-VLAN-switch-configuration) 
* [UNIFI - Wireless Uplink Topology](https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/articles/205146000-UniFi-Set-up-UAPs-in-wireless-uplink-topology)


***
`**RFC's**`
***
 
* Rfc5415 - Control And Provisioning of Wireless Access Points (CAPWAP) Protocol Specification
* Rfc5417 - Control And Provisioning of Wireless Access Points (CAPWAP) 
* Dhcp-option60 - integration with dhcp for provisioning
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
